name.en: HaoTab New Tab - Use ChatGPT for free

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 专注自定义新标签页的强大功能，自由拖拽排序，10000+4K高清壁纸库
short.en: Focus on the powerful functions of customizing the new tab, 10000+4K high-definition wallpaper library

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
HaoTab新标签页，整合了HaoTab AI组件，可以自由免费使用chatgpt
选择HaoTab的三⼤原因：
① 真正的“⾃由”定制
搜索引擎→修改位置、透明度、按钮、更换搜索引擎
⽹址→增、删，添加⽹址，随意拖拽放置
壁纸→海量高清壁纸/动态壁纸任你选择，修改
小组件→自由拖拽，自由放置，支持大中小三种模式，让你的首页更加丰富
②“好用”才是王道
ChatGPT无需魔法，0成本感受AI的强大功能。
微信扫码登陆，无需注册，快速便捷
⼀键进⼊“极简模式”，保护隐私不⽤愁。
③“海量”的选择⽆⼈能敌
⽹址→8000+个⽹址供您选择，增、删，自定义添加
壁纸→10000+4K高清壁纸库，我们仍在每天新增壁纸库，您还可以设置“定时更换壁纸”

我们还为您准备了以下精彩插件，欢迎体验：
①最近⼗五⽇天⽓|多个城市实时监测
②万年历-农历|每⽇凶吉
③每⽇⼀⾔|总有一款符合您当下心境
④主要媒体的新闻热榜|紧跟社会动向
⑤书签|让浏览器管理变得更井井有条
⑥备忘录|随时随地记录您的灵感想法和重要信息
long.en:
HaoTab new tab page integrates HaoTab AI components and can use ChatGPT freely and for free
Three reasons to choose HaoTab:
① True “free” customization
Search engine → modify position, transparency, button, change search engine
Web address → add, delete, add web address, drag and drop as desired
Wallpaper → Massive high-definition wallpapers/dynamic wallpapers for you to choose and modify
Widget → Free drag and drop, free placement, supports three modes: large, medium and small, making your homepage richer
② "Easy to use" is the king
ChatGPT requires no magic and can experience the power of AI at zero cost.
Scan the WeChat QR code to log in, no registration required, fast and convenient
Enter "minimalist mode" with one click, so you don't have to worry about protecting your privacy.
③The “massive” selection is unrivaled
Web address → 8000+ web addresses for you to choose from, add, delete, and customize
Wallpaper → 10000+4K high-definition wallpaper library, we are still adding new wallpaper libraries every day, you can also set "scheduled wallpaper change"

We have also prepared the following wonderful plug-ins for you, welcome to try them:
① Weather in the last fifteen days | Real-time monitoring in multiple cities
②Perpetual Calendar-Lunar Calendar | Unlucky Days
③One word per day | There is always one that suits your current mood
④Hot news lists from major media | Keep up with social trends
⑤Bookmarks|Make browser management more organized
⑥Memo | Record your inspirational ideas and important information anytime and anywhere
